content:
How to deal with this problem?
QQ图片20171008161231.png
I build it locally with this issue. How can I deal with that?
I use the HAPI validator and had that issue with DSTU2, it works with STU3. Believe the main java based validation moved into HAPI with STU3 http://hapifhir.io/doc_validation.html

I use the HAPI validator and had that issue with DSTU2, it works with STU3. Believe the main java based validation moved into HAPI with STU3 http://hapifhir.io/doc_validation.html

I use the HAPI validator and had that issue with DSTU2, it works with STU3. Believe the main java based validation moved into HAPI with STU3 http://hapifhir.io/doc_validation.html

sorry, I check local version is STU3, so how can I deal with that?
I'd check you're discriminator, should be defined in the profile. I think you've used the same code for both of your Observation.components.

I'd check you're discriminator, should be defined in the profile. I think you've used the same code for both of your Observation.components.
